column2: # Load the mtcars dataset
data(mtcars)
# Calculate the mean and standard deviation of mpg for cars with different numbers of cylinders
mean_mpg_4_cyl <- mean(mtcars$mpg[mtcars$cyl == 4])
sd_mpg_4_cyl <- sd(mtcars$mpg[mtcars$cyl == 4])
mean_mpg_6_cyl <- mean(mtcars$mpg[mtcars$cyl == 6])
sd_mpg_6_cyl <- sd(mtcars$mpg[mtcars$cyl == 6])
mean_mpg_8_cyl <- mean(mtcars$mpg[mtcars$cyl == 8])
sd_mpg_8_cyl <- sd(mtcars$mpg[mtcars$cyl == 8])
# Print the results
cat("Mean mpg for cars with 4 cylinders: ", mean_mpg_4_cyl, "\n")
Mean mpg for cars with 4 cylinders:
cat("Standard deviation of mpg for cars with 4 cylinders: ", sd_mpg_4_cyl, "\n")
Standard deviation of mpg for cars with 4 cylinders:
cat("Mean mpg for cars with 6 cylinders: ", mean_mpg_6_cyl, "\n")
Mean mpg for cars with 6 cylinders:
cat("Standard deviation of mpg for cars with 6 cylinders: ", sd_mpg_6_cyl, "\n")
Standard deviation of mpg for cars with 6 cylinders:
cat("Mean mpg for cars with 8 cylinders: ", mean_mpg_8_cyl, "\n")
Mean mpg for cars with 8 cylinders:
cat("Standard deviation of mpg for cars with 8 cylinders: ", sd_mpg_8_cyl, "\n")
Standard deviation of mpg for cars with 8 cylinders:
